Headline: Delays Affecting Pink Line Trains
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with significant delays from congestion after an earlier medical emergency on the tracks at California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with significant delays from congestion after an earlier medical emergency on the tracks at California.

  • Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Polk to 54th/Cermak in both directions.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
